title: PMS 2.0 568 - No Thursday Night Football Thursday, Stefon Diggs, Ian Rapoport, Mike Rupp, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about the different bowl games as bowl season is in full swing, and look at some of the favorites for Coach of the Year, MVP, and more and a quick look ahead to this weekend's games. Joining the program to chat about everything going on around the NFL as we move into week 17, what the new Covid protocols mean for players testing positive and updates on different guys coming back from Covid this weekend, if Carson Wentz is going to be able to play, who's going to punt for the Packers, his thoughts on whether or not this will be Big Ben's last year, and more (13:44-41:17). Next, 2x Pro Bowler, All-Pro, WR for the Buffalo Bills, Stefon Diggs joins Pat and AJ to chat about the season thus far, how last weekend's win over the Patriots gave them some momentum, his relationship with Josh Allen, how often he talks to his brother, and more (43:21-53:39). Later, Stanley Cup Champion, #9 overall pick of the 1998 NHL Draft, co-host of That's Hockey Talk, The Rupper, Mike Rupp joins Pat and AJ to give us an update about the NHL season, when these games are supposed to start continuing, what it's like having so many different cultures in the locker room, he tells some incredible stories about his time in the NHL, and who's going to win the Stanley Cup (1:26:59-1:52:37). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us. Cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
